data.title: JOYDEEP CHAUDHURI
data.meta_description: Joydeep Chaudhuri is a professor at Central Michigan University.
data.text:
Biography

Dr. Chaudhuri is a MD from India with a Masters degree in Anatomy and Cell Biology. Since 1997 he has taught medical, dental and Physician Assitant, Physical Therapy and Occupational Therapy students in India, Malaysia, FInland, Canada and United States. His previous research experience includes studies on chick , rat and mouse models of Fetal Alcohol Syndrome and Alzheimer's disease. His current research is on approaches to enhance intrinsic motivation in students and ameliorate the mental distress associated with cadaveric dissection.
